Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign dashboard: top entities, network graph, doc type chart, heatmap

Restructure the dashboard to prioritize the most important data above
the fold. New layout puts a ranked Top Mentioned Names list \(60%\) and
Key Stats panel \(40%\) at the top, with Network Graph, Document Type
Bar Chart, and Entity x Document Type Heatmap below.

New components:
- TopEntities: ranked list with search, sort, click-to-highlight
- StatsPanel: compact vertical metrics with refresh
- DocTypeChart: color-coded bar chart of document types
- DocTypeHeatmap: entity x doc_type matrix with color intensity
- SearchFilter: global search box and doc type filter chips

Cross-component filtering: selecting an entity highlights it in the
heatmap; selecting a doc type dims unrelated bars/columns.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
